name: InstalliOSProvisioningProfile
description: Install an apple provisioning profile required to build on a macOS agent
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: provProfileSource
inputs.label: Provisioning Profile Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: A provisioning profile can be installed from an uploaded `Secure File`, or a file in the source repository or a file on the agent.

inputs.name: provProfileSecureFile
inputs.label: Provisioning Profile
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the provisioning profile that was uploaded to `Secure Files` to install on the macOS agent.

inputs.name: provProfileFilePath
inputs.label: Provisioning Profile
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the path to the provisioning profile to install on the macOS agent.

inputs.name: removeProfile
inputs.label: Remove Profile After Build
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to specify that the provisioning profile should be removed from the agent after the build or release is complete.

messages.NO_PROVPROFILE_FOUND: No provisioning profile was found matching %s.
messages.MULTIPLE_PROVPROFILE_FOUND: Multiple provisioning profiles were found matching %s. Update the input to match one provisioning profile to install.
